game.name: Rock 'N' Roll Defense
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 폭발적인 사운드트랙에 휩싸여 밴드를 선택하고, 장비를 배치하고, 완전히 하드코어 타워 디펜스에서 로큰롤을 무너뜨리려는 모든 사람과 모든 것으로부터 로큰롤을 방어하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rocked by an explosive soundtrack, choose your band, place your equipments and defend the Rock 'N' Roll from everyone and everything who try to pull it down, on a totally hardcore tower defense!

reviewHighlights.text: A great cheap tower defence game with an AWESOME soundtrack! If you're looking for deep tactical Kingdom Rush/Bloons style Tower Defence? you wont fin...
A game so bad and yet so addictive as any other tower defense. The music is awesome thou.
